title: Roux Fanci Full Mousse #52 White Mink 6 oz
description: ROUX Fanci Full Mousse #52 White Mink adds color instantly when the hair is being styled for a beautiful, temporary, no-commit color. Refreshes, highlights and deepens color or blends away gray while adding extra conditioning for better manageability and shine.

title: Frizz Ease Curl Reviver Styling Mousse, 7.2 Ounce
description: Soft-hold formula restores bounce to tired waves, ringlets and perms. Featuring a highly-effective blend of Panthenol and frizz-reducing conditioners. It restores elasticity for springy curls that bounce back.
